verses.roman:
sakala dekhiye tāṅte adbhuta-kathana
prakāṇḍa-śarīra, śuddha-kāñcana-varaṇa

synonyms: sakala dekhiye—I see everything; tāṅte—in Him; adbhuta-kathana—wonderful description; prakāṇḍa-śarīra—very large body; śuddha—pure; kāñcana—gold; varaṇa—complexion.
translation: "Everything is wonderful about that sannyāsī. He has a very well built and luxurious body, and His complexion is like purified gold.
